samahara welawata wadu wruththiya.pedareru wruththiya,emeth nathnam krushikarmaya.puthage simawan oya tika athare sima weyi.ethanin eha apita wagema eyatath hina thiyenawa.eeth eyage hina saha ape hina walata wada wadagath aayathanayak sakshath kara ganna balaporoththu wena sudusukam walin puthata yanna puluwan durayi.

ewani awasthawakata mama muhuna dila thiyenne ek awasthawakadi pamanayi.
mata loku balaporoththuwak thibuna ‘ee’ nawayak ganna puluwan wewi kiyala.

maha banku bandumkara wanchawa pilibandawa ee sandaha waradikaruwan wana siyalu dena wagakiwa yuthu bawa da mehidi awadharanaya kala janadhipathiwaraya pawathi dushitha palanaya wenas kara yahapalanayak sandaha wu itha pawitha්ra chethanawen yuthuwa yahapalana rajaya godanaga gaththe pasugiya yugaye sidukala waradi nawatha sidukirimata nowana bawa da awadharanaya kaleya.
awamangala sabhawak natumen, gayumen, wayumen, niwena paththuwana
maha polowa kampa karawana tharam sidu wana mewan ha anekuth minis ghathana pilibandawa mema piris muniwatha rakithi.
ee nisa rosa patin andum ehema hadagaththa.
namuth prajathanthra wadaya raten nathiwigiyabawak janathawanam danne na.
“apage nawathama shakhawa, sigrayen sanwardhanaya wemin wenas wana rajagiriya nagarayehi wiwrutha kirimata haki wima pilibandawa api imahath sathutata pathwemu.

hondayi ithin, oba apata monopoliyak denawa nam dawal kalaya athalatha eliya nishpadanayata, api ethakota wishala pramanayakin sathwa thel, gal anguru, thel, lahatu, iti, madhyasaraya, ridi, yakada, loha, ha palingu yanadiya ape karmanthaya sandaha mila di ganimu.
